Job Title: Expert Engineer - Onboard Diagnostics, Electromobility

Location: Greensboro, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Research, Science

Description:
Are you an Engineer who is passionate about a sustainable future? Do you seek a job where you can feel that you are making a difference every day?

If the answer is yes, then we have a great opportunity for you! Volvo Group is seeking an Expert Onboard Diagnostics Engineer to join our Electromobility North America team in Greensboro, NC.

What You Will Do

At Volvo Group Electromobility NA you will contribute to the transformation of our company, the transport industry and society at large. You will:

 Be the North America leader for onboard diagnostics and cert for powertrain on BEV vehicles. Interpret and communicate diagnostic regulations and certification requirements. Create diagnostic requirements for embedded software and system development. Support vehicle development with validation of onboard diagnostics. Assist with preparation work for certification filing. Training others in OBD and certification processes

Your future team

Volvo Group Electromobility is responsible for the development of hardware, software, and systems for Battery Electric Propulsion in the Volvo Group products. The Emob North America team focuses on the market specifics for energy storage in batteries, electric motors and drive systems, electrical distribution and charging system, and electric propulsion control. The team secures the quality of the developed and deployed solution meets the demands stated in requirements and acceptance criteria. The unique combination of analytical and technical skills together with understanding of the business requirements and domain knowledge allows the team to verify the quality of the solutions used in our products.

We want to make a difference by being there for our colleagues and our customers and by providing high quality and reliable products. All over the world. Every day. You will work with a diverse and passionate team who value a culture of learning and mentoring. You will have a chance to work hands on with solutions under development and apply your skills to deliver only the highest quality to our customers.

We Have a Strong Culture Based On Our Company Values, Which Are Central To All Of Our Work. We Believe In a Work Environment Where

 We constantly strive for outstanding Performance. We are obsessed with Customer Success. We initiate Change to stay ahead. We willingly place our Trust in each other. We have a huge Passion for what we do.

Who are you?

You are an individual passionate about both electromobility and onboard diagnostics /verification. You are action and result oriented person and can prioritize your time in an effective way to accomplish your goals. Great communication and being a team player are highly appreciated skills by us. You are a person who is always looking for improvements in our way of working. In an inspiring environment promoting innovation you will together with a team of passionate engineers get the opportunity to develop both your professional as well as your individual skills.

Requirements

 Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or a related field 12+ years of related experience Experience working with tools such as Vision, Canalyzer, etc. Driver license for car is a minimum; CDL is beneficial Experience with scripting using Python or other tools Previous experience in embedded software development Knowledge of diagnostics legal requirements and powertrain certification (ZEP cert, 1971.1, 1956.8, 1962.5) Experience with diagnostics certification work Diagnostics communication experience (SAE J1979, J1979-2, J1979-3, J2012, ISO 14229, ISO 27145, ISO 15765, ISO 15031) Experience with xEV powertrain operation and diagnostics preferred High analytical ability and passion for problem solving, paired with creative and network building abilities, ensures that you succeed in this role

What’s in it for you?

We offer a solid package of compensation and benefits, including:

 Competitive medical, dental and vision insurance. Generous paid time off including paid caregiver and parental leave policies. Competitive matching retirement savings plans. Working environment where your safety, health and wellbeing come first. Focus on professional and personal development through Volvo Group University. Programs that make today’s challenging reality of combining work and personal life easier. Want to learn more about these programs? Continue your exploratory journey with us here .

Ready for the next move?

Apply today to join our team in sharing the future of the transportation industry with us!

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

Who We Are And What We Believe In

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. We are committed to removing the barriers to entry, which is why we ask that even if you feel you may not meet every qualification on the job description, please apply and let us decide.

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join Volvo Group. Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

Group Trucks Technology are seeking talents to help design sustainable transportation solutions for the future. As part of our team, you’ll help us by engineering exciting next-gen technologies and contribute to projects that determine new, sustainable solutions. Bring your love of developing systems, working collaboratively, and your advanced skills to a place where you can make an impact. Join our design shift that leaves society in good shape for the next generation.

Experience Level (if available): None
